review:
Hi all, today I will be sharing the knee replacement journey for my mother Mita Kanjilal (aged 67 years).
From past 5 - 6 years she was having difficulty in walking due to much work. 


It aggravated to unbearable pain in the last couple of years affecting his mobility in the recent months.
Just before the surgery the pain was so severe that she was unable to stand straight and once she sits somewhere it was very difficult for her to get up by herself.

When it almost reached an ultimatum, surgery was the only choice.

Search began for the best orthopedics doctor and hospital with proved track record.
Initially we visited Narayana hospital and consulted with an orthopedic, no doubt he was good.
Although before proceeding with the surgery we just wanted to have a second opinion and that time we have consulted Dr Kumardev Arvind Rajamanya.
Immediately after the first consultation me and my family felt that this is the doctor we should go for.
The way he explained the current situation post X-RAY was noteworthy and also the behavior and calmness.

Finally, after the 2nd consultation we have decided to go for the surgery based on our preferred date.

His patient hearing (answering to every small question clarifying doubt), thorough examination, transparent genuine diagnosis, understandably explaining the medical condition/problem, and the treatment options available to rectify the issue was extremely convincing and there was no looking back.

Dr. Kumardev kept checking on us at every step pre and post-surgery. His personal attention to every patient even with his busy schedule from the initial stage is highly commendable
He explained in detail the surgery procedure and all the care we should take almost every single day, he even let us meet with his existing patients in order to gain more confidence before we actually go for the surgery.

During our stay in the hospital, the Doctor guided the Hospital staff at every step, took personal care, and monitored all the parameters regularly.

My Mother was made to walk with an aide on the second day of the surgery and was discharged from the hospital on the eight days since we had to go through total knee replacement for both the knees.


Dr. Kumardev disciplined approach, extreme expertise in his area, and continuous monitoring care helped in the speedy recovery of my mother.
Doctor gave us an elaborate list of Dos and Don'ts post-surgery and during discharge which helped my mother and us to take care of him.
It is extremely fulfilling to see my mother recover so quickly and back to his normal activity almost 2 - 3 months post-surgery. 

We would highly recommend Dr. Kumardev amongst all our family and friends.

paining. She Used to apply different Ayurvedic oils and Ayurvedic treatment. Took continuous
painkillers for daily relief. Her Orthopedician gave 3 maximum steroid Injections on both the

weight gain. She stopped doing her yoga exercises as stretching legs was no more possible.

transplantation. Thereafter we shifted to Bengaluru and since 2016 onwards we started
consulting different doctors for their 2nd opinions. All most all the doctors from the very
beginning told that she required immediate Total knee implants of both the right and left legs as
the cartridge of both the legs was worn out.
2. My son searched the Internet and concluded with information gathered based on ratings of Dr. Kumardev Arvind Rajamanya, Orthopedician, Manipal hospital, Whitefield, Bengaluru. Immediately we took appointment and consulted the
Doctor. The doctor advised immediate both the knee transplantation as it was overdue from
2016. He also told any further delay in surgery would result into bending of legs, the deformity of
which cannot be repaired thereafter. The Doctor also very positively advised that my wife can
easily go to the US after 3 months of surgery with good home Physiotherapy.

on 05/07/2021 morning. She has been fasting since the evening of 04/07/21. On 05/07/21 morning at
08:00 am. She was taken into Operation Theater. We were told that my wife was given total General anesthesia and the surgery would take 2-3 hours. Right knee surgery was
successfully finished by 12:00 pm. and the Doctor told that he would take up surgery of her left
knee on 08/07/2021 based on her tolerance of pain. Thereafter in the evening, Physiotherapy
started for her and she was asked to walk with crutches. She was complaining some pain under
anesthesia effect. But later in the evening and next day it was more. But by 07/07/2021 night
The pain got reduced and got ready for left knee surgery on 08/07/21. Accordingly, she was
operated her Right knee on 08/07/21. Thereafter she was in the hospital for 5 days. She did
physiotherapy in the morning and night. She was discharged after that with instructions to
undergo home physiotherapy for 3 months. We utilized the services of Mr. Jyothi Kiran,
Physiotherapist, Manipal hospital, Whitefield who was daily morning and evening used to visit
our house and made my wife alright. He is a thorough professional in physiotherapy.

helpful.

Overall I am thankful to God that I took the decision to take my mom to Manipal Whitefield and luckily met Dr Kumardev. Thankfully my mom is back on her feet and is totally independent like she was before.

review:
I have consulted Dr. Kumardev for my mother. She was having pain in both the knees for almost 10 years. I tried my best to convince my mother to get knee transparent for past 10 years. In 2017 I was able to convinced her to come with me to Manipal hospital.
We did all the test and she was diagnostic with grade 4 (Last stage) arthritis. We were almost ready to get the surgery but in the last moment she backed off (Due to fear mongering by relatives)
Four year passed and pain start growing from bad to worse. This time pain was unbearable and finally she said "YES" to have surgery.

I decided to take her to Manipal Whitefield again. One of my friends is working in Manipal and she suggested to have consultation with Dr Kumardev. As suggested by her we consulted Dr. Kumardev and my mother was diagnostic with same grade 4 arthritis!!
Dr Kumardev explained us everything in details about her condition and suggested to go for surgery. He explained everything patiently about surgery. He gave lot of confidence to my mother and finally my mother was more confident about surgery!!
Finally, the judgement day came and on 24-Feb-2021 left knee was operated on and 26-Feb-2021 right knee was operated on. Both the surgeries were successful and she is in much better situation now.
It’s very important to choose the right doctor for surgeries. I would highly recommend Dr Kumardev for orthopedic related issues. He is expert in his subject and take care of his patient very well.


Note: Physiotherapy is must after surgery otherwise surgery will not be that effective. We did physiotherapy for two-month post-surgery.

I have consulted Dr. Kumardev for my mother. She was having pain in both the knees for almost 10 years. I tried my best to convince my mother to get knee transparent for past 10 years. In 2017 I was able to convinced her to come with me to Manipal hospital.
We did all the test and she was diagnostic with grade 4 (Last stage) arthritis. We were almost ready to get the surgery but in the last moment she backed off (Due to fear mongering by relatives)
Four year passed and pain start growing from bad to worse. This time pain was unbearable and finally she said "YES" to have surgery.

I decided to take her to Manipal Whitefield again. One of my friends is working in Manipal and she suggested to have consultation with Dr Kumardev. As suggested by her we consulted Dr. Kumardev and my mother was diagnostic with same grade 4 arthritis!!
Dr Kumardev explained us everything in details about her condition and suggested to go for surgery. He explained everything patiently about surgery. He gave lot of confidence to my mother and finally my mother was more confident about surgery!!
Finally, the judgement day came and on 24-Feb-2021 left knee was operated on and 26-Feb-2021 right knee was operated on. Both the surgeries were successful and she is in much better situation now.
It’s very important to choose the right doctor for surgeries. I would highly recommend Dr Kumardev for orthopedic related issues. He is expert in his subject and take care of his patient very well.


Note: Physiotherapy is must after surgery otherwise surgery will not be that effective. We did physiotherapy for two-month post-surgery.

Our experience with Dr Kumardev has been nothing short of excellent and more so I would like to qualify this with the statement that he not only breathed life into my mother's bones but also into our spirits and morale which took a beating after a scary accident at home. 
My mother Mrs Usha Sarma was admitted to Manipal emergency after a horrible fall at home resulting in a left hip/thigh Femur Fracture of a very peculiar nature. The pain was excrutiating and we felt extremely helpless as we rushed her to the Manipal Whitefield emergency. Dr Kumardev examined her and very quickly diagnosed that the peculiar and rare nature of the fracture was due to the condition of osteoporosis combined with bisphosphonate medication issues which had made her bones extremely brittle. He recommended surgery. He also proactively diagnosed that there was another weak point on her right Femur which would soon lead to a similar fracture if unattended. He recommended surgery for both the Femurs. His ability to beautifully articulate the issues and the procedures step by step with a lot of patience helped us understand and feel comfortable that the right direction was being taken. He even guided us to papers written by the clinical community for this rare issue. We had by then realised that this was a very rare kind of fracture and there were not too many case studies. We prayed for the best. Dr Kumardev handled both the surgeries personally and with a lot of care and sensitivity to our frequent doubts and questions. The post surgery care and follow ups were also very nicely handled by him and his lovely team. We have been going for follow ups to him for over a year and a half now and every visit is filled with the exact situation explained beautifully, a lot of positivity and a personal touch. He has also been very open to us reaching out to him on whatsapp and phone over the last 1.5 years each time giving us a patient listening and the right directions. We are extremely grateful that we were in such able and caring hands. Now my mother is back to her completely normal self.
A special thanks to him and his team. God bless him as continues to help folks get back on their feet and use their limbs and bones to the fullest.
